channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【Leveraging Microsoft 365 Agents SDK with Semantic Kernel for Enhanced Multichannel AI】利用 Microsoft 365 Agents SDK 和语义内核来增强多通道 AI
item.description: 【As the landscape of AI continues to evolve, meeting users where they are is vital. We want to spotlight the newly released Microsoft 365 Agents SDK and its seamless integration with Semantic Kernel. This powerful combination empowers developers to create robust AI agents that operate across various channels where users are already engaged. Extend the […]】随着人工智能领域的不断发展，满足用户的需求至关重要。我们希望重点介绍新发布的 Microsoft 365 Agents SDK 及其与语义内核的无缝集成。这种强大的组合使开发人员能够创建强大的人工智能代理，这些代理可以在用户已经参与的各种渠道上运行。延长 [...]

item.title: 【Announcing the Public Preview of AI Shell】宣布 AI Shell 公开预览版
item.description: 【We are pleased to announce the public preview of AI Shell.】我们很高兴地宣布 AI Shell 公开预览版。

item.title: 【Announcing LangChain integration for your SQL-based AI applications】宣布 LangChain 集成您基于 SQL 的 AI 应用程序
item.description: 【In today’s data-driven world, the ability to seamlessly integrate various technologies is crucial for efficient data management and analysis. We’re excited to announce LangChain integration with Azure SQL Database and SQL database in Microsoft Fabric! LangChain, a powerful tool for building solutions with language models, can be effectively combined with these services to build AI-ready […]】在当今数据驱动的世界中，无缝集成各种技术的能力对于高效的数据管理和分析至关重要。我们很高兴地宣布 LangChain 与 Azure SQL 数据库和 Microsoft Fabric 中的 SQL 数据库集成！ LangChain 是一个使用语言模型构建解决方案的强大工具，可以有效地与这些服务结合起来，构建人工智能就绪的 […]

item.title: 【LangChain Integration for Vector Support for SQL-based AI applications】LangChain 集成为基于 SQL 的 AI 应用程序提供矢量支持
item.description: 【LangChain Integration for Vector Support for Azure SQL and SQL database in Microsoft Fabric Microsoft SQL now supports native vector search capabilities in Azure SQL and SQL database in Microsoft Fabric. We also released the langchain-sqlserver package, enabling the management of SQL Server as a Vectorstore in LangChain. In this step-by-step tutorial, we will show […]】LangChain 集成对 Microsoft Fabric 中的 Azure SQL 和 SQL 数据库的矢量支持 Microsoft SQL 现在支持 Azure SQL 中的本机矢量搜索功能和 Microsoft Fabric 中的 SQL 数据库。我们还发布了langchain-sqlserver包，支持将SQL Server作为LangChain中的Vectorstore进行管理。在本分步教程中，我们将展示[...]

item.title: 【Introducing a new landing page and welcome tour for Microsoft developer portal!】Microsoft 开发人员门户推出新的登陆页面和欢迎导览！
item.description: 【At Microsoft, we are dedicated to shaping a developer experience that is efficient, user-friendly, and tailored to your needs. With the new landing page and welcome tour, we’re excited to empower you to work more effectively and unlock new levels of productivity. Together, we’re building a platform that evolves with you. At Microsoft, we’re focused […]】在 Microsoft，我们致力于塑造高效、用户友好且根据您的需求量身定制的开发人员体验。通过新的登陆页面和欢迎导览，我们很高兴能够帮助您更有效地工作并释放新的生产力水平。我们正在共同构建一个与您一起发展的平台。在微软，我们专注于 [...]

item.title: 【A wrinkle in how Windows 95 setup bootstrapped its initial GUI step】Windows 95 安装程序如何引导其初始 GUI 步骤中的一个问题
item.description: 【Getting access to the common controls that don't exist until Windows 95.】访问 Windows 95 之前不存在的常用控件。

item.title: 【Build AI apps faster and easier with SQL database in Fabric – now Public Preview!】使用 Fabric 中的 SQL 数据库更快、更轻松地构建 AI 应用程序 - 现已公开预览！
item.description: 【The SQL Server and Azure SQL team has embarked on a mission to make building AI apps faster and easier than ever, announcing the Public Preview of SQL database in Microsoft Fabric. This new simple, autonomous and secure, and optimized for AI service will help you in the era of AI, where 1 billion new […]】SQL Server 和 Azure SQL 团队的使命是让构建 AI 应用程序比以往更快、更轻松，并宣布在 Microsoft Fabric 中推出 SQL 数据库的公共预览版。这种新的简单、自主、安全且针对人工智能优化的服务将帮助您进入人工智能时代，其中有 10 亿新 […]

item.title: 【Azure Cosmos DB Shines at Microsoft Ignite 2024!】Azure Cosmos DB 在 Microsoft Ignite 2024 上大放异彩！
item.description: 【Microsoft Ignite 2024 took over the Windy City this week, bringing with it new technological innovation and exciting product announcements aplenty! If you missed the first day of the show, don’t worry – we’ve got you covered with all the latest and greatest Azure Cosmos DB news. This year’s event saw great enthusiasm and attendance […]】Microsoft Ignite 2024 本周接管了风城，带来了新的技术创新和令人兴奋的产品发布！如果您错过了展会的第一天，请不要担心 – 我们为您提供了所有最新、最精彩的 Azure Cosmos DB 新闻。今年的活动热情高涨，出席人数众多 […]

item.title: 【VisualStudio.Extensibility 17.12: CodeLens support is here!】VisualStudio.Extensibility 17.12：CodeLens 支持现已推出！
item.description: 【We continue to invest in the VisualStudio.Extensibility SDK to allow users like you to create extensions that run faster and smoother than ever before! VisualStudio.Extensibility helps you build extensions that run outside the main Visual Studio IDE process for improved performance and reliability, and can be installed without the need to restart Visual Studio. Additional […]】我们继续投资 VisualStudio.Extensibility SDK，让像您这样的用户能够创建比以往运行得更快、更流畅的扩展！ VisualStudio.Extensibility 可帮助您构建在主 Visual Studio IDE 进程之外运行的扩展，以提高性能和可靠性，并且无需重新启动 Visual Studio 即可安装。额外的 […]

item.title: 【What’s new for Office Add-ins at Ignite 2024】Ignite 2024 上的 Office 加载项新增功能
item.description: 【The Office Platform team has been busy working on improvements to the platform since we last reported. This blog covers the new features from the office-js team announced at Ignite 2024.】自我们上次报道以来，Office 平台团队一直忙于对该平台进行改进。本博客介绍了 Office-js 团队在 Ignite 2024 上宣布的新功能。
